title: Missing You
lyrics:
Baby girl what you been on? (what you been on?)
I've been away too long
No text or call, ouu I know that's wrong (I know that)
I'm on your [?] please tell me you on (please tell me you on)
'Cause I'm tryna make up for that, yeah
'Cause I can't fight the feeling, I need you back (yeah)

And I'm right here where we left it at (yeah)

I can't front girl I did you bad

Reminiscin' with you but even you feel the difference



So I pop a pill or two 'cause here with you it still so distance

Yeah, yeah, yeah

So distant (ayy, ayy, ayy)

So distant



You wanna know what I been on

That story way too long (too long)

Too many models with these bottles of Patr√≥n (yeah)

You know I be in my zone (yeah)

You know I be in the club throwin' duckets

I ain't buggin' [?] it ain't nothin' gotta love it

Spent so much time stressin' shit

When I'm out here ain't no budget

No excuses, I ain't tryna change the subject

I don't do this shit for nothin'



So I pop a pill or two 'cause here with you it still so distance

Yeah, yeah, yeah

So distant (ayy, ayy, ayy)

So distant
